snippet: The group is reaching out to parents and scouts around the nation as it decides whether to continue or rescind its ban on gay members and leaders.
abstract: Boy Scouts of America sends out 1.1 million surveys to parents and scouts as it continues to grapple with whether to rescind ban on gay members and leaders; questionnaires features detailed questions concerning how exactly shift might occur.
lead_paragraph: The group is reaching out to parents and scouts around the nation as it decides whether to continue or rescind its ban on gay members and leaders.

headline.seo: Boy Scouts Sends Survey to Members About Ban on Gays
headline.main: Boy Scouts Sends Survey to Members About Ban on Gays
headline.print_headline: Boy Scouts Sends Questionnaire To Members About Ban on Gays
